title: Steve's Regular Job, On Blast, Wwhhispering, Inevitable Arguments and more.
itunes:title: Steve's Regular Job, On Blast, Wwhhispering, Inevitable Arguments and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! This show goes out to a special group of people because Uncle Steve said so. Did you know that a few drops of sodium filled liquid could increase chances of employment? Ever have speakerphone blunders because of what you said? The CLO returns to help a young woman who wants forever from her man. Here go the lines that men use when they don't want to talk about it at all. Steve and his Nephew are onto something with this wwhhisper thing. The fellas give you the things couples can do together that will lead straight into an argument right here. Inside Girl Chat, the ladies give the best advice on how to have a good morning. Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog brings us a quote from legendary sculptor Michelangelo Buonarroti about the importance of aim.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! This show goes out to a special group of people because Uncle Steve said so. Did you know that a few drops of sodium filled liquid could increase chances of employment? Ever have speakerphone blunders because of what you said? The CLO returns to help a young woman who wants forever from her man. Here go the lines that men use when they don't want to talk about it at all. Steve and his Nephew are onto something with this wwhhisper thing. The fellas give you the things couples can do together that will lead straight into an argument right here. Inside Girl Chat, the ladies give the best advice on how to have a good morning. Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog brings us a quote from legendary sculptor Michelangelo Buonarroti about the importance of aim.
